title: Low Priority Queue

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body: Hey Forum, I recently had my account get put into "Low Priority Queue", I think this is a good move to those who afk, but whereas in my case it was technical issues on my connection. In my attempts to complete my low priority queue during AI games, my 5 minute queue increased to 10 minutes then again to 20 minutes. This was due to internet problems. I didn't leave the game, I always reconnected cause of the disconnection that occurred a lot, I have posted my match history and it shows I have not left a game, and i have mainly played AI games, I don't think it is necessary to add on longer queues when doing AI games, if you can please remove or lower the 20 minute queue on my account, I would be grateful.

replies.body: Going afk in a game for 3-5 minutes can easily cost you the entire game. If you have such an issue with connectivity why are you playing a game that requires a constant internet connection...

yeah I had the same issue... several bug splats for 2 games in a row, couldn't connect once. I'm in  20 minute low priority queue and would like to request the removal or minimization of this low priority queue. Thank you in advance Riot support.

Edit: If this could be done as soon as possible I would be truly grateful.

> I always reconnected cause of the disconnection that occurred a lot

Not to say that you left, but exactly how long does it take you to "reconnect" to a game after disconnecting?
Well the time it took the modem to reset then the relog and loading screen, i'd say about 3-5 minutes per disconnection.

I read somewhere that the time limit the game gives you to reconnect is five minutes.

MMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMM THAT SOUNDS REAL CLOSE IF YOU KNOW WHAT I'M SAYING

My opinion is that five minutes is way too quick to consider a person to be "away from keyboard". Hell, you might even employ a tactic in game that involves waiting for five minutes (buffs take five minutes to spawn). But that's another matter.

Maybe get a modem that's quicker to reset?
